title: Eternal Jacob
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Benton Murdoch Spruance [1904-1967], Philadelphia, PA, until November 1952; Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, November 1952 until April 11, 1957 [1]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, April 1957 [2].

Notes:
[1]. Mrs. Beal acquired the lithograph from the artist in November 1952 for $24 (see receipt from the artist, dated November 1952.) 
[2]. The lithograph appears on a list of Spruance prints (this one "bl.&wh" with a valuation of $24,) which were sent to Carnegie Institute in May 1956 "For addition to other prints by Spruance." It was accessioned on April 11, 1957.
